languages.text: "Но вскоре, познав тебя лучше, я поменяла свое мнение. Не о мон-к... не о твоем виде. Но о тебе, {name}. Все то, что произошло с Крударахом. Все то, что случилось с моими собратьями. И что осталось в Комморре... Все это я смогла пережить лишь благодаря тому, что Азуриан свел наши пути".

"But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."
languages.original_text: "Но вскоре, познав тебя лучше, я поменяла свое мнение. Не о мон-к... не о твоем виде. Но о тебе, {name}. Все то, что произошло с Крударахом. Все то, что случилось с моими собратьями. И что осталось в Комморре... Все это я смогла пережить лишь благодаря тому, что Азуриан свел наши пути".

traits.locale_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I've changed my mind. Not about mon-k... not about your species. But about you, {name}. Everything that's happened to Crudarach, to my kinsmen, and what's been left in Commorragh... I could live through all of it only thanks to the fact that Asuryan crossed our Paths."

"But soon, after getting to know you better, I've changed my mind. Not about mon-k... not about your species. But about you, {name}. Everything that's happened to Crudarach, to my kinsmen, and what's been left in Commorragh... I could live through all of it only thanks to the fact that Asuryan crossed our Paths."

"But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what remained of them in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

"But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what remained of them in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

"But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what remained of them in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

languages.text: “但很快，随着我对你的了解进一步深入，我渐渐改变了看法。不是对猴——不是对你的族人的看法，而是对你的看法，{name}。发生在克鲁达拉赫的一切，发生在我族人身上的一切，以及发生在科摩罗的一切……我之所以能忍受这一切，是因为阿苏焉指引你我走上了同一条道途。”
languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

traits.locale_text: “但很快，随着我对你的了解进一步深入，我渐渐改变了看法。不是对猴——不是对你的族人的看法，而是对你的看法，{name}。发生在克鲁达拉赫的一切，发生在我族人身上的一切，以及发生在科摩罗的一切……我之所以能忍受这一切，是因为阿苏焉指引你我走上了同一条道途。”

languages.text: «Pero en cuanto tuve ocasión de conocerte mejor, cambié de opinión. Y no me refiero a los mon-k... no hablo de tu especie. Me refiero a ti, {name}. Todo lo que pasó con Crudarach, con mis parientes y lo que quedaba de ellos en Commorragh... si lo he podido resistir ha sido solo porque Asuryan quiso que nuestras sendas se encontrasen».
languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

traits.locale_text: «Pero en cuanto tuve ocasión de conocerte mejor, cambié de opinión. Y no me refiero a los mon-k... no hablo de tu especie. Me refiero a ti, {name}. Todo lo que pasó con Crudarach, con mis parientes y lo que quedaba de ellos en Commorragh... si lo he podido resistir ha sido solo porque Asuryan quiso que nuestras sendas se encontrasen».

languages.text: « Mais en apprenant à vous connaître, j'ai fini par changer d'avis. Pas à propos des mon-k... de vos semblables, mais à propos de vous, {name}. Tout ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach, à mes semblables et les événements de Commorragh... Si j'ai pu le supporter, c'est uniquement parce qu'Asuryan a uni nos Voies. »
languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

traits.locale_text: « Mais en apprenant à vous connaître, j'ai fini par changer d'avis. Pas à propos des mon-k... de vos semblables, mais à propos de vous, {name}. Tout ce qui est arrivé à Crudarach, à mes semblables et les événements de Commorragh... Si j'ai pu le supporter, c'est uniquement parce qu'Asuryan a uni nos Voies. »

languages.text: "Aber schon bald, als ich Euch besser kannte, änderte ich meine Meinung. Nicht über Chem... nicht über Eure Art. Aber über Euch, {name}. Alles, was Crudarach zustieß, meiner Art, und was in Commorragh passierte ... Ich konnte das alles nur ertragen, weil Asuryan unsere Pfade zusammengeführt hatte."
languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

traits.locale_text: "Aber schon bald, als ich Euch besser kannte, änderte ich meine Meinung. Nicht über Chem... nicht über Eure Art. Aber über Euch, {name}. Alles, was Crudarach zustieß, meiner Art, und was in Commorragh passierte ... Ich konnte das alles nur ertragen, weil Asuryan unsere Pfade zusammengeführt hatte."

languages.text: 「だが、お前をよりよく知るようになって考えが変わった。モン＝ケ…お前たちの種族についてではなく、お前自身のことだ、{name}。クルダラに起きたこと、我が同族に起きたこと、コモラフで明らかになったこと…我が耐えられたのはアシュリアンが我らの道をひとつにしてくれたからだ」
languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、お前をよりよく知るようになって考えが変わった。モン＝ケ…お前たちの種族についてではなく、お前自身のことだ、{name}。クルダラに起きたこと、我が同族に起きたこと、コモラフで明らかになったこと…我が耐えられたのはアシュリアンが我らの道をひとつにしてくれたからだ」

languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, . Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what remained of them in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

languages.text: "Fakat seni daha yakından tanıdıkça fikrimi değiştirdim. Mon-keighler... Pardon, türün hakkındakini değil. Senin hakkındakini {name}. Crudarach'ta soydaşlarımın başına gelenler, tüm o yaşananlar ve Commorragh'ta olanlar... Hepsine göğüs gerebilmemin sebebi, Asuryan'ın Yollarımızı birleştirmesiydi."
languages.original_text: "But soon, after getting to know you better, I changed my mind. Not about mon-k— not about your kind. But about you, {name}. Everything that happened to Crudarach, to my kin, and what transpired in Commorragh... I was able to endure it all only because Asuryan brought our Paths together."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat seni daha yakından tanıdıkça fikrimi değiştirdim. Mon-keighler... Pardon, türün hakkındakini değil. Senin hakkındakini {name}. Crudarach'ta soydaşlarımın başına gelenler, tüm o yaşananlar ve Commorragh'ta olanlar... Hepsine göğüs gerebilmemin sebebi, Asuryan'ın Yollarımızı birleştirmesiydi."
